docs.snippet: The Government of Uruguay, as the result of negotiations with the Foreign Bondholders Protective do Council, Inc., made the following offer yesterday to holders of its dollar bonds: The 5 per cent bonds of 1915 to receive 3 1/2 per cent interest;
docs.lead_paragraph: The Government of Uruguay, as the result of negotiations with the Foreign Bondholders Protective do Council, Inc., made the following offer yesterday to holders of its dollar bonds: The 5 per cent bonds of 1915 to receive 3 1/2 per cent interest;
docs.abstract: Offer to holders of dollar bond issues

headline.main: BOND OFFER BY URUGUAY; Result of Talks With Council-The Terms Are Detailed

docs.snippet: Continued apathy toward the bond market on the part of most investors left traders yesterday free to make appraisals of certain outstanding obligations affected by special situations, with the result that the market generally held within a narrow...
docs.lead_paragraph: Continued apathy toward the bond market on the part of most investors left traders yesterday free to make appraisals of certain outstanding obligations affected by special situations, with the result that the market generally held within a narrow range in exceedingly light trading.

docs.snippet: Sharp advances in both exports and imports between the United States and the principal foreign countries in April over the same month in 1936 were reported today in the monthly survey by the Department of Commerce.

docs.snippet: Texas greeted nineteen Latin-American nations today with a Pan-American exposition to cement the goodneighbor policy. Dressed in hew splendor since last year's centennial celebration, the exposition grounds provided a vast pattern of historical...
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas greeted nineteen Latin-American nations today with a Pan-American exposition to cement the goodneighbor policy. Dressed in hew splendor since last year's centennial celebration, the exposition grounds provided a vast pattern of historical commemoration, dedicated to the "amigos" south of the Rio Grande.

headline.main: DALLAS EXPOSITION OPENS; Pan-American Show Strikes Note of Friendship to South America
